name: Epic Helicopters, LLC
about: Epic Helicopters, LLC, based in Fort Worth, Texas, is a leading provider of professional airplane and helicopter flight instruction. We offer initial, recurrent, transition, and advanced training programs, including a renowned Professional Pilot Program. Our state-of-the-art facilities, spanning 14,000 square feet, feature integrated smart classroom technology, student housing, and transportation. We operate a fleet of reliable Robinson helicopters and provide training in both fixed-wing and rotary-wing aircraft. With a strong focus on safety, Epic Helicopters maintains an accident-free record and employs certified instructors who tailor training to individual needs. Our curriculum is designed to ease learning plateaus and prepare students for real-world aviation careers. We are committed to producing safety-minded, confident, and competent aviators with the highest level of integrity and safety. Join us at Epic Helicopters to achieve your aviation goals.
